field.name: summary
field.value: Multiple databases usage without ActiveRecordBase inheritance doesn't work

field.name: description
field.value:
We can't use multiple database when we use ActiveRecordMediator to manipulate our Active Record classes. Apparently, the intermediate abstract class must inherite of ActiveRecordBase. If not, there is an exception saying that my intermediate abstract class doesn't have a primary key
see http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=2775
